sentences: José Eleazar Gómez Sánchez (Spanish pronunciation: [eleˈasaɾ ˈɣomes]; better known as Eleazar Gómez born May 29, 1986 in Mexico City, Mexico) is a Mexican actor.
On November 6, 2020, Gómez was arrested and accused of domestic violence.
Gómez was freed on March 26, 2021 after he pleaded guilty of domestic violence charges and was fined with 420,000 pesos and a three-year parole period.
